Package org.waarp.common.logging

Classes implementing logging facility

See:
          Description


Interface Summary
WaarpInternalLoggerInterface To enable detection of internal logger from Gg Common
 

Class Summary
WaarpInternalLogger Logger inspired from Netty implementation, adding some extra commands that allow to limit the overhead of some ignored logger calls (toString or string construction is called only if necessary).
WaarpInternalLoggerFactory Based on the Netty InternalLoggerFactory Based on The Netty Project (netty-dev@lists.jboss.org)
WaarpJdkLogger java.util.logging logger.
WaarpJdkLoggerFactory Logger factory which creates a java.util.logging logger.
WaarpSlf4JLogger Example of logger using SLF4J from LOGBACK
WaarpSlf4JLoggerFactory Example of logger factory using SLF4J from LOGBACK
 

Package org.waarp.common.logging Description

Classes implementing logging facility
